circle_bundles.LocalTrivAndCocycle

class circle_bundles.LocalTrivAndCocycle(local_triv, cocycle, report, quality, nerve)[source]

Bases: object

Return container for Bundle.get_local_trivs().

Parameters:

  • local_triv (LocalTrivResult)

  • cocycle (O2Cocycle)

  • report (TransitionReport)

  • quality (BundleQualityReport)

  • nerve (NerveSummary)

local_triv

Local trivialization data (angles/coordinates, charts, etc.) produced by circle_bundles.trivializations.local_triv.compute_local_triv().

Type:

circle_bundles.trivializations.local_triv.LocalTrivResult

cocycle

Estimated O(2) cocycle (transition data) produced by circle_bundles.o2_cocycle.estimate_transitions().

Type:

circle_bundles.o2_cocycle.O2Cocycle

report

Transition estimation report containing per-edge diagnostics such as RMS angle error.

Type:

circle_bundles.o2_cocycle.TransitionReport

quality

Bundle-quality diagnostics produced by circle_bundles.analysis.quality.compute_bundle_quality_from_U().

Type:

circle_bundles.analysis.quality.BundleQualityReport

nerve

Nerve summary computed from U (independent of local trivializations).

Type:

circle_bundles.summaries.nerve_summary.NerveSummary

Notes

This is a lightweight container intended for interactive use and for caching results on the Bundle instance. It does not perform any computation.

__init__(local_triv, cocycle, report, quality, nerve)
Parameters:

  • local_triv (LocalTrivResult)

  • cocycle (O2Cocycle)

  • report (TransitionReport)

  • quality (BundleQualityReport)

  • nerve (NerveSummary)

None
